Perceptor::

Perceptor moved slowly in the darkness and said "SO..."said angry the 
male"even I've sworn loyalty to you Swichblade, you try to kill 
me???? You can try it if you like... but first I'll fight!!!!"

Perceptor Transformed to his robot mode and with sharped nails tried 
to scratch at Swichblade and Firestrike.
